website_summaries.verdict: Featuring a lightweight structure, the Nike Flex Contact 3 is designed to provide a comfortable and efficient ride. It is a good option for runners and athletes who are looking for a flexible and breathable running companion that is easy to slip on and off. It is ideal for neutral runners or those who do not overpronate.
pros: Wearers have testified that the Nike Flex Contact 3 is fast and lightweight
This running shoe is comfortable to wear, based on reviews
Many runners love the flexibility of the shoe
The upper is breathable, according to some commenters
It offers just the right amount of cushioning, a few users claim
Several purchasers mention that the shoe offers a snug fit
People are happy that the Nike Flex Contact 3 is affordable
A couple of buyers noticed that this running companion is easy to put on
cons: A few testers noted that the Nike Flex Contact 3 does not offer enough ankle support
This shoe is a bit narrow, said some consumers
One runner reported that it is not durable enough for long runs
Some wearers dislike that there are no laces to tighten the shoe

customer_reviews.title: These are like water shoes - Shoes had holes within 2 hours of first wear
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my 22 year old son. Within 2 hours of putting them on they developed a small hole. Within 2 days they had holes all over them. As he was at school and I needed to wait to get them back we missed the return deadline. Filed a claim with NIKE. Guess what? They give you a claim number but they don't tell you where to send them back too and when I called their Customer Service couldn't tell me either. I do not recommend these shoes. Save your $$$ and buy water shoes for $20 - these aren't worth $79.99.
customer_reviews.author: SLK1220

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Extremely lightweight, comfortable, decent thickness to soles so it feels like there is padding between you and the ground. Good tightness for not having adjustable laces. Seem to run just a bit large length-wise, could almost be considered wides in the toe area, but fit fine no need to exchange. Style is great.
customer_reviews.author: stargazer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe
customer_reviews.text: After Purchasing two pair I bought another pair because you’re very comfortable to walk in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable- wide toe box and heel is great for those with narrow heel. Just right amount of cushioning. The sole is flexible and a good option for people who like a minimal shoe.
customer_reviews.author: gabememe

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shoe 3rd pair.
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old big footed grandson loves these. This is his 3rd pair of the exact same shoe.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gillis

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I'm a true size 6 in women after reading the reviews to size up I ended up ordering a size 6.5 and they fit perfect women. The white stripped look more as a grey color instead of white still cute.
customer_reviews.author: M. BEJINES

customer_reviews.title: Comfy ,true to size
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son ,and he loved them. He said they were very comfy and fit true to size. Nikes can sometimes run a bit small,but these didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Billy&Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes super comfy and light for runs. Will buy more in other colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super handy shoes. Fit well
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be a bit temperamental when I ran because there are no laces, but these shoes are great. They fit well, the elastic included makes it so they hug my feet well. I also took them to Japan last year where they came in SUPER handy taking them on and off more than I usually would.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Kosoglov

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and fit perfectly from the moment I tried them on!!️
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable - fit perfectly as soon as I tried them on and my feet are on the wide side so wasn’t sure if I had to break them in or not. So glad I didn’t have to and VERY pleased overall!!️
customer_reviews.author: Cheer Mom

customer_reviews.title: Arches
customer_reviews.text: Not a good fit for someone who has high arches (like me). Come home from work with bruises on the top of my feet. Would have returned but was too late.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The strap broke in less then a month and you can't return them
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bland

customer_reviews.title: Way off on size! Order 6 & get size 11?!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 6 & got size 11! Frustrating figuring how to get return slip printed! Not everyone owns a printer! Also the post office is closed for lunch for an hour every day at time I’m out of work. It’s been a hassle to return this package. Frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Natural walk and proper fit. Lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, flexibility, support and style. Time will tell how durable. Overall, functional.
customer_reviews.author: Curt S.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek!!
customer_reviews.text: Super sleek and comfortable. Very light weight yet supportive. Great gym shoes and definitely great walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher  Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were used and the right shoe was torn at the toe. I can’t believe these shoes were sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The size is small
customer_reviews.text: The size doesn’t fit, is small, a half inch less
customer_reviews.author: Vansantin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Most of my exercise shoes are bright colors. These look great with everything.
customer_reviews.author: grammy

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable but a good fit for running
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes -comfortable for a morning run or great at the office on casual days. I love the no laces but still having a fit that works for exercise
customer_reviews.author: T. Curtin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. Usually replace every 6 months so I keep a pair in the box at all time
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend bought a black pair and once they worn out he had to buy them again! He loves the way they feel and fit!
customer_reviews.author: Rusti Bassett

customer_reviews.title: quite comfortable without complaints
customer_reviews.text: so far so good after breaking them in for my long distance jog’s and walk’s. extremely comfortable without much pain when walking and jogging on hard surfaces. just waiting to see how durable these pairs will be.
customer_reviews.author: jamedia

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Flex Contact 3 Track & Field Shoes
